title: Master lists deletable in Vouchers hub
root_cause: In edit mode, all list cards show a selection checkbox but no per-card delete with confirmation. The only delete path is bulk-select then Delete Selected. While bulk delete does show a ConfirmationModal, handleDeleteSingle() and setDeleteConfirmation({type:'single'}) are never triggered from the UI â€” the wiring was missing. Lists like Ontopo/Movies & Shows (reservation type) that appear in ReservationsHub expose the same unguarded pattern. Users can accidentally multi-select and delete template-created lists.
fix_applied: Added a trash icon (Trash2 from lucide-react) per list card in VouchersHub and ReservationsHub edit mode. Clicking it calls setDeleteConfirmation({ type: 'single', listId: list.id }), which triggers the existing ConfirmationModal with the deleteVoucherList / deleteReservationList title and message. This wires up the already-present handleDeleteSingle flow through a deliberate, confirmed UI action.
completion_summary: Added Trash2 import, per-card trash button in edit mode in both VouchersHub.tsx and ReservationsHub.tsx. Build passed clean.
